comment.author: 18848263@N06
comment._content: That's a great shot.  It is actually Archer Avenue coming out of Willow Springs at about 9400 S. or so just before you get to the turn at 95th street to get to Maple Lake.

comment.author: 93265881@N08
comment._content: I agree with the location, but to clarify we are looking northeast here.  The higher ground on the right would be up the moraine, away from the canal.  The tracks do curve left at about 9400S Archer, facing Northeast.

comment.author: 18848263@N06
comment._content: I agree thanks for the extra detail.
